title: Desart Builders
description: Desart Builders epitomizes excellence as a Design-Build Firm, ensuring unparalleled peace of mind for clients by seamlessly managing all project services through TEAM DESART. With a commitment to classic design principles that enhance user experience, I spearheaded this project single-handedly, delivering a timeless solution that exceeds expectations.

title: Best Drop Taxis
description: Best Drop Taxis is an innovative taxi service platform allowing passengers to book rides between any two points at any time. The booking process begins with collecting trip details from passengers, followed by estimating the distance, duration, and price for all available vehicles using a distance matrix. After verifying the booking with an OTP, passengers receive a confirmation email, and the admin is simultaneously notified through their provided email.

title: Sri Garuda Travels
description: Garuda Travels is a dynamic travel website offering a wide variety of services and packages. I developed a seamless CMS panel, enabling the team to add and update packages dynamically. Additionally, I focused on on-page SEO to enhance visibility and attract more visitors. This, combined with the efforts of our digital marketing team, has positioned Garuda Travels as the best choice for trips in South India.

title: Greenfields Cbe
description: Greenfields is a real estate website designed to help buyers explore property details through images and descriptions in Coimbatore. In this project, I developed a dynamic Content Management System (CMS) panel that enables administrators to manage property listings, images, and content seamlessly. I also implemented SEO best practices to enhance site performance and search engine visibility, ensuring the website loads quickly and provides a smooth user experience.

title: Inbound Trails
description: Inbound Trails is a tourism website showcasing the rich culture and diversity of India to foreign tourists. I independently managed the entire project, creating a custom CMS panel for the content team and a unique admin panel for site management. Additionally, I developed a fully dynamic booking process that automates acknowledgments to both admin and clients via email, allowing easy tracking of trip statuses. This project highlights my ability to handle complex web development tasks and deliver efficient, user-friendly solutions.

title: SNS Placements
description: The project aimed to showcase the SNS College Placements Details through visually appealing bar charts, enhancing its attractiveness to prospective students during admission periods. Additionally, I developed a CMS panel to enable dynamic content management by the content team.

title: Space Y
description: Space Y is a social media web application in progress, built using React, Redux, MongoDB, Firebase, and Express Js. With a dynamic user interface, seamless data storage, real-time updates, and secure messaging, it redefines online social interactions.

title: Cholan Shop
description: Cholan Shop, an E-Commerce site in progress, combines the power of Next.js and Redux with MongoDB for robust data management. The implementation of Tailwind CSS ensures a sleek and responsive design, underscoring a commitment to cutting-edge technologies for an innovative and seamless user experience.

title: Cholan Store
description: Cholan Store a unified admin panel for Cholan Shop using Next.js, Redux, Typescript, MongoDB, and Tailwind CSS.  This cohesive approach ensures smooth communication between the Cholan Shop E-Commerce site and its admin interface, creating an integrated and efficient system.

title: SkinDect
description: Space Y is a social media web application in progress, built using React, Redux, MongoDB, Firebase, and Express Js. With a dynamic user interface, seamless data storage, real-time updates, and secure messaging, it redefines online social interactions.
